name: C2iS
description: Founded in 2003, C2iS now has 35 employees. Our company is a community of enthusiasts and experts who have theÂ same digital vision. Our team is made up of strategic planners, senior project managers, UX designers, artistic directors, web designers, front-end developers, back-end developers and technological experts (Symfony 2, Resalys, SynXis, SITRA). C2iS was elected Digital Agency in the Region in 2012 by the selection committee of Agencies of the Year awards.
